title: Add Info about the new project
label: Self-Identified Gender
spec1: 1a. What terms best express how you describe your gender identity? (Check all that apply)
list1: None of these describe me, and I’d like to consider additional options
source1: RADx [All of Us Research Program PPI]
definition1: NCIt and CDISC:  Gender Identity (Code C158277) – Definition:  A person's internally held sense of their gender, which may or may not correspond to the individual's genotypic or phenotypic sex.
spec2: 1b. Are any of these a closer description to your gender identity?
list2: Questioning or unsure of your gender identity
definition2: NCIt and CDISC:  Gender Identity (Code C158277) – Definition:  A person's internally held sense of their gender, which may or may not correspond to the individual's genotypic or phenotypic sex.
